metadata.title: CVE-2016-7551 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: chain_sip in Asterisk Open Source 11.x before 11.23.1 and 13.x 13.11.1 and Certified Asterisk 11.6 before 11.6-cert15 and 13.8 before 13.8-cert3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (port exhaustion).

criterions.comment: asterisk package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:13.11.2~dfsg-1').
